rooms.description: Large entrance hall with reception area and coat closet, designed to welcome guests.
Spacious living room with modern furniture and large windows for natural light, following Vastu principles by facing east.
Dining area adjacent to the kitchen, promoting family interactions.
Modern kitchen with integrated appliances and functional storage, designed for efficiency.
Master bedroom with attached en-suite bathroom, designed for privacy and relaxation.
Second bedroom designed for children or guest use, with ample storage.
Third bedroom for additional family use or guest, ensuring comfort and privacy.
En-suite bathroom for master bedroom, designed with modern fixtures and ample storage.
Additional bathroom for other bedrooms, ensuring convenience.
Private gym with ample space for equipment and exercise, located in a quiet corner of the ground floor.

openings.description: Main entrance door on the north side, ensuring a positive Vastu flow.
Window to allow cross ventilation and natural light from the south.
Staircase leading to the rooftop terrace, designed for safety and ease of access.

levels.level_notes: The ground floor is designed to maximize natural light and ventilation in accordance with local building norms and Vastu principles. The split-level design allows separate living areas while maintaining connectivity.

rooms.description: Fourth bedroom for additional guest or family use.

openings.description: Window designed to allow light into the upper floor, following Vastu principles.

levels.level_notes: The upper level is compact and primarily serves as an extra sleeping area, with minimal interruptions to maintain privacy.

openings.description: Entrance to the rooftop terrace from the upper floor.

levels.level_notes: The rooftop terrace provides an open-air relaxation area with panoramic views, designed in accordance with modern aesthetics and Vastu guidelines for positive energy flow.
